mcq.statement: Grammatically correct: a. The film was so good, I could hardly believe it. b. The film was so good, I couldn't believe it. c. The film was so good, I couldn't hardly believe it d. The film was so good, I could believe it.

options.a: The film was so good, I could hardly believe it.
options.b: The film was so good, I couldn't believe it.
options.c: The film was so good, I couldn't hardly believe it
options.d: The film was so good, I could believe it
